body.name: IOTXY 4-Tier Open Shelf Bookcase - Modern Freestanding Wooden Display Stand Unit with Metal Frame for Home and Office, Bookshelf, Gold White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 56 mins
features: DAZZLING BEAUTY APPEARANCE - Classic combination of gold and white colors, whole present a modern minimalist light luxury style, Looks very elegant and full of a cold belle temperamental;
EXCELLENT SUITABLE MATERIALS - High-grade metal frame use nano-level piano paint collocation with marble grain shelf and X-shaped support part on the back make the bookshelf stable and durable;
AMPLE CAPACITY DISPLAY SPACE - 4 pieces extra big and smooth display storage shelves, the surface area of each board is 3.23 square feet and 0.71 inches thick, wide and strong enough for heavy-duty;

OUTSTANDING DESIGN IDEAS - Natural and straightforward without losing personality, the overall design is perfect if it reflects the modern people's pursuit of elegant taste and generous atmosphere of life;
ASSEMBLY WITHIN 20 MINUTES - We provide detailed, step-by-step instructions for easy assembly;
body.description: IOTXY Freestanding Open Shelf Bookcase 2/3/4/5 Tier Bookshelf This floor-standing bookshelf is manufactured from iron and marble engineered wood board with a nano-level piano baking varnish process. The gold and white color combination makes the unit whole present a light luxury style. The bookshelf is suitable for use in various scenarios: A Organizer for Entryway A Bookcase for Study A Display Stand for Living Room A Collection Rack for Kitchen A Storage Unit for Bedroom A Picture Book stand for Children's Room A Bookshelf for Lounge Suitable for Home and Office

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful decent bookshelf
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf is decent for the price and if you’re on a budget and are looking for something that makes a room in your home standout, I would definitely recommend it. When we first received it, we noticed that there was a connector missing (we contacted the seller, but unfortunately got not response), but managed to find a temporary fix as this bookshelf will only be used in our temporary home for the next 15 month. It is sleek and pretty easy to put together if you have all of the pieces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well-made, super easy to put together, very attractive. Couldn’t ask for more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and looks great
reviews.reviewText: This shelf was easy to assemble. It looks great and is sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, good quality for the price, and so cute. Docked a star because it’s not super sturdy (a couple of holes didn’t line up very well) — will wobble if I bump it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome cute plant shelf
reviews.reviewText: I love this colorful shelf for my plants which matches great. Set up was super easy. Came with 3m corner protectors, I couldn’t get they to stick, but I think that was totally m fault I did not clean the corner surfaces. On challenge for the 4 shelf is larger plants won’t fit. Keep that in mind and look at the sellers measurements. Great shelf if I need a matching set I will buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf is very good looking in my home office. It was easy to assemble and accents my them perfectly. I am going to purchase another asap!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bigger than stated
reviews.reviewText: I needed this for a particular space. The depth of the area is 13.5 inches. It states the depth is less than 12 inches so I thought it would fit. Unfortunately, with the legs and back it is just over 13.5 inches. I’m trying to figure out if I need to take it apart send it back now because I can’t use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing product despite low price
reviews.reviewText: I was a little skeptical of this product since it is priced lower than similar products on Amazon and it's relative lack of reviews, but was so pleased with the result! They were easy to assemble, has no deformities or imperfections on any of the pieces and is very sturdy. We decided not to use the included wall anchors as the piece is very heavy but sturdy- our very large cat can jump off and not even shake the shelf. We feel safe with this product around our pets
